name: Hexlock
description:
WASD or Arrow Keys - Movement
Left Click - Auto shot in direction of mouse
Right Click - Charge shot: First Stage - small amount of damage
                                                          Second Stage - greater than a single auto shot
                                                          Third Stage - powerful shot that pierces enemies
Shift or Space - Dash
F - Clone: distract enemies with a clone with a cooldown
E - Interact

In the land of Fate Isle, a man desperately wanted to bring his love back to life. In his attempts, he ended up making a contract with a being from another dimension. This being was a Lich God and in doing so, he tricked the man into giving him is own body.

Ever since that day the Lich God has been using his necromancy to summon other beings from his dimension through the graves of those who have passed. By using the souls of the dead, the Lich God has taken control of the land of Fate Isle. To destroy the portal between the two dimensions, one much defeat the Lich God.

Hexlock is a top down 2D shooter where purge the undead with your magical Hexlock. With this magical armament, you have the power to reduce this so called god to ash.
